channel.title: Jun's Blog
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: My Second Blog
item.description:
omniata-acquirer

This is the repository project for Omniata Acquirer usage, which includes:

  1. Data pulling from multiple ad networks.

  2. Backend rewrite for the acquisition events from attribution partner.

  3. Some scripts for the server side automation.

Notes: this project will be automatically deployed to CP with bamboo when push to master branch.

Technical details of ad networks API.

Twitter

Using Twitter [Ads API] (https://dev.twitter.com/ads/overview).

The Metrics and segmentation are defined here.

Gem Library twitter-ads.

Log in here to get the access token and access secret. The server client repo is here.

Check the Omniata Twitter APP to get the consumer key and consumer secret, the app is now with only the Developer level with maximum 5 access tokens supported, and need to apply for the Basic and Standard level in the future.

Facebook

Using Facebook ads insight API version 2.5.

Access Token can be got from facebook login. It is also the same git repo as Twitter.

The Facebook APP can be viewed here, it is already with the standard access level with unlimited access token.

Gem library koala.
